channel.description: > # [color = "darkred"] The Ritualist [/color] > **[color = "darkred"] Cult Special [/color]** > **Brotherhood (Day)** - Make a cult member appear like a member of blue dragon - 2 uses > **Exhume (Day)** - At the end of the night, learn what classes killed a player,or if they committed suicide - 1 use > **Brain Manipulation (Night)** - Displays a message to a player depending on their current status(They will appear healed/warped from bleeding, or if not statused attacked but healed/warped. If warped it will show the message they were attacked),You can select if you want to warp them or heal them, if they were statused they will no longer know, but will still die unless healed/warped by another player. - 3 uses > **Teleport (Night)** - Cause all players targeting one of your target players to target the other. Bypasses redirect immunity. You will be occupy immune if you target yourself. - 2 uses > *Defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.* > > # [color = "darkred"] The Seeker [/color] > **[color = "darkred"] Cult Investigator[/color]** > **All-Seeing Eye (Day)** - Using your ability "gaze" will instead give you there faction as well as their class type. - 1 use > **Expose(Day)** - Learn who the prince jails tonight - 1 use > **Gaze (Night)** - Determine a player's class - 3 uses > **Reveal (Night)** - Discover whos a player targets and who targets them - 2 uses > *Defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.* > > # [color = "darkred"] The Invoker [/color] > **[color = "darkred"] Cult Offensive [/color]** > **Fanatic (Passive)** - Immune to occupation and redirection abilities. > **Drugged Substance (Day)** - Using any of your abilities tonight will remove the targeted player's death immunity, and occupy immunity. If you occupy them tonight they will receive a message as if they were hhed. - 1 use > **Bloody Trap (Day)** - Anyone who visits you tonight will be occupied, goes through occupy immunity - 1 use > **Chains of Corax (Night)** - Occupy a player, preventing them from taking any action tonight. - 3 uses > **String of Mithras (Night)** - Control a player selecting who they target tonight - 2 uses > *Defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*

item.title: Just Some Cult Reworks
item.dc:creator: invoker
item.description:
personally I think apostle is in probably the best state about the whole noble twin thing is more of a noble problem then an apostle.

item.title: Just Some Cult Reworks
item.dc:creator: invoker
item.description:
The Ritualist

Cult Special
Brotherhood (Day) - Make a cult member appear like a member of blue dragon - 2 uses
Exhume (Day) - At the end of the night, learn what classes killed a player,or if they committed suicide - 1 use
Brain Manipulation (Night) - Displays a message to a player depending on their current status(They will appear healed/warped from bleeding, or if not statused attacked but healed/warped. If warped it will show the message they were attacked),You can select if you want to warp them or heal them, if they were statused they will no longer know, but will still die unless healed/warped by another player. - 3 uses
Teleport (Night) - Cause all players targeting one of your target players to target the other. Bypasses redirect immunity. You will be occupy immune if you target yourself. - 2 uses
Defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.

The Seeker

Cult Investigator
All-Seeing Eye (Day) - Using your ability “gaze” will instead give you there faction as well as their class type. - 1 use
Expose(Day) - Learn who the prince jails tonight - 1 use
Gaze (Night) - Determine a player’s class - 3 uses
Reveal (Night) - Discover whos a player targets and who targets them - 2 uses
Defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.

The Invoker

Cult Offensive
Fanatic (Passive) - Immune to occupation and redirection abilities.
Drugged Substance (Day) - Using any of your abilities tonight will remove the targeted player’s death immunity, and occupy immunity. If you occupy them tonight they will receive a message as if they were hhed. - 1 use
Bloody Trap (Day) - Anyone who visits you tonight will be occupied, goes through occupy immunity - 1 use
Chains of Corax (Night) - Occupy a player, preventing them from taking any action tonight. - 3 uses
String of Mithras (Night) - Control a player selecting who they target tonight - 2 uses
Defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.

Read full topic
